values: Why is it I am always surrounded by annoying ass people?? It never fails. I always find myself stuck in bad situations with these people I should have never been involved with in the first place.

This overwhelming failure.
The inability to move on. 
One step forward, three steps back.
The vicious cycle turns round and round.
Open minded with nothing to say.
Close minded with no purpose.
Keeping  your distance but still too close.
Every turn is one for the worst. 
I feel it climbing back inside me, I thought that I had escaped it.
I know now there is no running, only tumbling.
Rolling downward, collecting it with every spin.
A bigger mess now that it has ever been. 
No help will be provided, no words of wisdom to hear.
Having to do this on my own, I have to conquer this fear.

So today has been pretty good so far. I'm still really nervous about my class tonight but I'm sure it will be fine...I checked the site I bought my book at and it says estimated arrival date isn't until 8/27! ugh! I hope this is ok...Hopefully I'll be able to use someone else's book until then or something. 
So, my buddy at work was telling me about his marital problems a few minutes ago. It's sad. I can't really offer too much of an opinion because I really was shocked when I found out his situation. His wife is not at all what I picture him with physically or personality wise either really...and she has 3 kids that are not his and he has been supporting them all for the last 3 years until 2 weeks ago she finally got a job. Anyway, none of my business really but it is a shame to hear his problems. I wish there was something I could do to make him feel better. :-/  I'm pretty sure I'm over the whole Matt thing, the other guy at work....
I'm not sure that I have a crush on anyone really. I think I crave a lot of things I don't get from my own relationship and that is why I keep searching for someone new to fill the void. 
I mean I don't feel right in the head here lately. I have been very stressed out more than normal. I need to go to the damn Dr and get my meds again for my anxiety and adhd but I just don't have the money right now. ugh.
Anyway, I'm going to smoke countless cigarettes for the rest of my lunch break!

So, last night we went to Crowley's to see our friend's play. It was super fun while we were there but on the way home I was texting a friend and Mark flips out on me asking me who the hell I am texting and tries grabbing my phone from me to look through it. Well before he had went all flipping out on me my phone wouldn't let me reply to the last message I received because my texts were too full. So, I deleted all my messages and send the reply. So the only message in my phone was the one I sent last and he thinks I deleted all my messages so he couldn't see who I was talking to, which is ridiculous. I have nothing to hide. So he is all yelling at me and driving like a maniac, in my new car by the way, while drunk. not a fun situation. so anyway, he keeps saying he wants to see my phone bill when we get home and if i dont have one we could go online and look at it. I was perfectly fine with this because as I said I have nothing to hide. But, when we got home he went straight to bed. I went in there and was like I thought you wanted to see my phone bill and he was like whatever I'll look at it tomorrow. So, I had my paper version of my most recent phone bill sitting on the counter top all day, still up there, and he has not once looked at it. He had to work today so he left at about 7:30 this morning and forgot his cell phone here so I didn't talk to him until he got home at about 5:00 in which I asked if he was hungry, he said no, then he avoided me and stayed in a different room of the house until he went to "the store" and then he left for band practice and all he said while he was walking out of the house was "see ya later" I hate when he acts like this. It is so childish. 

On another note, I start my math class tomorrow. I'm nervous. 
I don't feel very good right now. I hope Mark is over this shit soon because it is one thing to be mad when you have a good reason but to be mad at me when I did nothing wrong...thats just annoying. I hate that he always tells me how I lie to him when he has never had a reason to say so but yet he is the one who lied to me before and it took him a year to come clean, I still stuck around! UGH.

So, my class starts on Monday. I have to go Mondays and Wednesdays from 7:30 - 9:50 pm. UGH! I had a nervous breakdown today about money. I didn't realize classes started so early or that tuition was due today by 3pm! So, my mom, being the fantastic woman she is paid by credit card over the phone. I overdrew my bank account today so I could get my cell phone turned back on and buy the book for my class and put gas in my car. I won't get the book until 4 to 7 days from now so I won't have it for the first 2 classes...:-/ a little nervous about this. I really hate I have to go to the class without my book, I hope it will not be a big deal. 

Mark and I went to see pineapple express tonight. We got stoned before we went. It was pretty damn funny but not as funny as I thought it would be. I'm not much into slapstick comedy so some of it was really cheesy to me. 

I'm so tired. I guess I'm going to sleep!

"Let us be lovers we'll marry our fortunes together"
"I've got some real estate here in my bag"
So we bought a pack of cigarettes and Mrs. Wagner pies
And we walked off to look for America

"Kathy," I said as we boarded a Greyhound in Pittsburgh
"Michigan seems like a dream to me now"
It took me four days to hitchhike from Saginaw
I've gone to look for America

Laughing on the bus
Playing games with the faces
She said the man in the gabardine suit was a spy
I said "Be careful his bowtie is really a camera"

"Toss me a cigarette, I think there's one in my raincoat"
"We smoked the last one an hour ago"
So I looked at the scenery, she read her magazine
And the moon rose over an open field

"Kathy, I'm lost," I said, though I knew she was sleeping
I'm empty and aching and I don't know why
Counting the cars on the New Jersey Turnpike
They've all gone to look for America
All gone to look for America
All gone to look for America


The above song is one of the many things that made me smile today. I have fabulous conversations with this really cool guy who is friends with a couple of my friends. He is gorgeous on the outside and I'm starting to find out he is pretty cool on the inside as well. No, I am not searching for a replacement for my current boyfriend. I know it seems I always have a new man to talk about, but I am starting to realize it is what you make of it. Mark and I have had some amazing times the last few days. He has been really nice for some reason and it feels like old times again. 

I have to register for my math class on Thursday and I don't know how I'm going to do this. ugh. I have no idea when I am going to be able to fit it in to my schedule with work. I'm praying maybe I can take a night class or online but I don't think either is an option for this class. :( I guess I will figure something out, I'll have to. 

Well, lunch break is almost over so I'm going to finish my chicken tendercrisp sandwich and smoke while enjoying my vanilla iced chai and then head back to work....where I will probably actually be on my laptop for because I am ALL caught up! haha

So, just got out of the shower. I'm going to curl my hair for tonight. It should be a fun night...we are going to the Lincoln Theatre for metal fest where Sanctity, Hellrazor and Blatant Disarray are all playing, among others as well..We are also going somewhere in Brier Creek to see some other friends of ours play.  
So my work boy text messaged me last night at 12 saying <3 you! haha He was drunk. I guess he does like me somewhat. I don't know. blah. 
I don't really feel like typing anymore.

so i got paid today and went to deposit my check into my bank account and found out that my account was in the negative massively. i have $18 of my $300 paycheck left. My car insurance is due by the 14th and i don't get paid again until the 15th. my car payment is due on the 17th and i will not have enough to pay it by then. (insurance is $134 and car payment is $343) AND my cell phone bill was due a long time ago but i called and had them keep my phone on today because i was planning on paying it today so now my only phone is going to be cut off. im not happy at all about any of this. 

so i go back to work after spending my whole lunch break at the bank arguing with them about my account since i am used to bank of america's online banking and bb&t's is totally different and that is why i overdrew my account, and im so upset and stressed out that i am crying. I go into my manager's office and tell her what happened. I had one cigarette left and my gas light was on in my car and the needle was right at the bottom of the line. she advanced me $100 from next week's paycheck thankfully but that doesn't solve my bills being due. it got me gas, cigarettes and i had to buy some bathroom products. I now have $17 left until next friday. 

I start a part time fucking job next week working for my boyfriend's sister at holiday inn working the front desk. This means I will be working 7 days a week and I will have absolutely no days to sleep in. I can't even make it to my regular job at 8am and I will have to be at the part time job on Saturday and Sunday at 7am. I really need the money right now though so I will have to do this atleast until I get caught up and I would like to get maybe 2 months ahead on my bills. 

Friday night and we are not doing anything. We went to the grocery store. What an exciting night. I'm really sleepy. I think I may go to bed early tonight...but I know I'm fucking sleeping in tomorrow dude...it is my last god damn weekend not having to work. BLAH!!!!!

Whatever. I'm over my life as it is right now.
work is boring. im ready to go.

So, I brought the laptop to work with me today. It was a fantastic idea because I piggy-backed off our work's WIFI and downloaded new music all day while I worked. Also, I actually had something to do during my hour lunch and when I finished everything on my desk. Today was pretty good I guess. The ONLY thing that really pissed me off today was the fucking dumb bitch Carol I have to work with. I wish everyone could have the chance to meet this cunt. She is the exact definition of everything I hate. She is like 60 something but tries to act like she is in her 20's. She is shorter and not too unattractive in the facial area and not too thin but not overweight at all...but she has the most disgusting legs on a person that I have EVER seen. Her legs look as though she used to weigh about 1,000 lbs and lost all but 130 lbs. She has spider veins and cottage cheese lumps all over them...kind of elephantitus looking. I know, you are probably thinking damn, you are so shallow and such an immature bitch to be talking about some older lady like this...BUT, you would have to be around this lady to understand. As I said before, I do ACCOUNTING among other jobs for a car dealership...like I'm also the dealer trade clerk...you know when dealerships buy and sell cars from each other's inventory. Anyway, the office I work in there has me, 3 other girls who do title work, post the deals and do some other internal accounting and then there is our office manager. Carol seems to think that since we are women in an office that we are nothing more then secretaries and janitorial staff. There is a receptionist that has a desk out on the sales floor who does some other things like filing, making car stickers, purchasing cars into our system and so on and also prints the letters for the service department and sales people. When the receptionist goes to lunch or steps away from the desk the phones are switched back to our office and we answer the phones while we continue to do our hectic jobs. Why am I ranting about our job duties? Because Carol continuiously comes back in our office and talks to us like we are below her. Our jobs could never be done by this woman as she is an idiot. The postage machine is in our office and everyone runs postage on their own mail, not hard to do right? Carol kept laying her stack of mail on top of the postage machine and would never put the postage on it herself. We would all joke about it because it was one more thing she did that got on our nerves. Every time a salesman would come in and run their postage they would pick up her stack and run hers too since it was just laying there to be done and all of us girls refused to do her job for her. One day one of the salesman finally asked us why there was always mail laying up there to have the postage ran on it. I told him it was because Carol refused to run her own mail and all of us left it there to teach her that her mail would go out sooner if she did her job right. This salesman is one of the funniest men I have ever met. He said "I'll fix this." He walked out and walked back in with Carol and said "This is how you do it." as he was running the postage Carol said "I know how to do it. I was told to leave it in here for the girls to do!" We all laughed and asked who told her that and she said that Jimmy the general manager of the store told her that. We then replied that he would never tell her that because even he runs his own mail and we are not her personal secretaries. Everyone dislikes this woman because she is rude, says inappropriate things all the time, steals sales from other salesmen and she's just plain gross. She wears short skirts with her nasty legs showing all the time and when she sits down she spreads her legs WIDE open so if you were walking by you would see everything! Anyways, the point of my story is that there have been countless situations with this woman that have made us all fislike her and today it took all I had not to punch her in the face. I had a really cute top that is bunchy up at the bust and real flowy everywhere else, you know a lot of tops out now are like this style and they are comfortable. I am not skinny. I know I am not skinny. This is my number one insecurity but I have been working out everyday for 3 weeks now and trying to change this about myself. I mean I'm not disgustingly fat and overweight...I wear a size 13 jeans. Anyway, today as I was walking back inside from smoking a cigarette and I was walking around the corner to our office door past Carol's desk she stopped me and said, "Michelle, is that a maternity shirt!?" She's very loud with everything she says so there is no telling who heard this but I was outraged. I was so pissed off all I could utter was um no. She then stated she didn't know because with the style of shirts out now they all look like maternity shirts to her. I just turned around and walked into our office. When I walked in all the girls could tell I was really pissed off and instantly asked me what had happened. I started out with oh my god I am so going to punch her in the face. They all laughed and asked oh god what did Carol do this time. So, I told them exactly what happened and they were all in shock and just as pissed off as I was. They all said she must just be plain evil because to say something like that knowing it would obviously hurt my feelings was just mean and uncalled for. I'm jumping around a lot with all of this because there is such a never ending story about what all this lady does and says that there is no way I could type it all out! Anyway, I told my manager and she was just as mortified as I was. I told her the next thing Carol says to me I am going to turn to her and plainly state to please not talk to me because I do not care to associate with her or hear anything else rude and uncalled for she has to say. My manager agreed this was probably the best way to handle things. Unfortunately my manager is not Carol's manager or Carol would already be gone. So, muffin. My boy at work. We started into a conversation today about dating people solely on looks alone. I don't really remember how the whole thing got started but we didn't get too much into it before we were interrupted by his manager. I just walked back inside because I was starting to get a little upset. I like him. I don't think he has any interest in me other than just friendship. I'm ok with this to a point but I don't want to hear it ever come straight out of his mouth. I have a feeling the only reason he isn't interested in me other than just friends is because I'm not thin. I hate this. This is why I always date guys way older than me. Guys my age or around my age are so shallow that they could care less what kind of connection they have with a girl as long as the girl was hot and by hot I mean has a good body. This society makes me sick. You watch TV or look at a magazine or even get on the internet and all you see are girls who have "perfect bodies". I don't hate girls like this. It isn't their fault that I'm fat and I don't think that they are dumb or boring just because they are pretty. I long to look like that. I long for guys to see me and think I am hot and then want to get to know me but I would be the one who had the deciding factor of wether or not I wanted to go any further with a relationship because I would know that everyone found me attractive and this was not IT. I'm sad. I have been working out and feel as though I am getting even larger. How is this possible?! I used to walk for months at a time and lose weight like over night. As soon as I did ANY form of exercise the weight would just melt right off of me...not anymore! I wish I had the will power to starve myself or something. Geez. I've been doing a lot of thinking lately about all my tattoos. I have a reason and meaning behind every tattoo I have on my body. I didn't get any of my tattoos to look cool...well that wasn't my main objective when I got them. Obviously people who are into tattoos think they are cool..but anyway, now they limit me I have come to find. Guys who are not attracted to modified girls rule me out immediately and I'm always sterotyped...not to mention the whole having to wear massive amounts of clothing to cover them up for work and family functions with my boyfriend's parents...since he is against my tattoos and his parents would probably have heart attacks if they knew I had a giant tattoo on my chest. I hate how the whole world and everything that exists is like one big oxymoron. Think about it. If you really sat and thought about one thing at a time you could probably see all sides of the issue and you would be just as confused as I am. I was so excited to start using this journal again and now I'm just kind of like...wow I'm just rambling on and on for now. I guess I just haven't gotten back in the groove of my writing again yet. Soon I will have my shit back together and my head on straight and something interesting and poetic to say....until then.

So since I used to use this journal things have changed, a lot. I live in the middle of nowhere out in Wayne County..Pikeville, NC to be exact. I live with my boyfriend of two years. Yes, if you glance through some old entries of mine you are probably just as shocked as me about a relationship lasting two years...especially living with the man for two years. Well, things are stressful like always. My boyfriend is fifteen years my senior. I love him dearly but things are definitely rough. We are at two different points in our lives, as most people would imagine since we have such an age difference. We've known each other for a while..funny story actually. I met him through a band in which he used to play with and I was at first messing with the singer. Sounds terrible I know. But, the singer and I were hanging out from time to time and I thought it was going to maybe progress into something more but then I find out the bastard was married with children! Yes, so amazing, a man who lies to get in a girl's pants. Anyway, we obviously stopped talking but we did remain somewhat friends and he introduced me to my boyfriend. Things were amazing for about the first year but afterwards things got and continue to get worse. 

I hate how when a relationship starts or you figure out you like someone you do everything you can to show how much you care and you try to impress that person any way you can. After you develop real feelings for the person they show who they really are...they start to do whatever makes them happy and could care less how it makes you feel. When they start acting like the real them most of us stick around..for different reasons I guess. My reason is complicated. I am a hopeless romantic. I also have this bad habit of rationalizing things and making excuses for things I really shouldn't put up with. I work full time at a car dealership doing accounting and only make $10 an hour. I have a $343 car payment and my car insurance is $200 a month...yes, I got a DWI last year and now am paying out the ass for insurance...my cell phone bill is never less than $90 a month and I am negative in two different bank accounts. I feel as though I will never get out of this money slump. I do not pay any of the household bills or rent towards our house payment. This sounds like I leech off of him. BUT, I would rather pay half of the bills around here than put up with the abuse I have to endure living here. I hate how reliant I am on him. I do not want to be dependent on anyone. I feel like such a loser being so in debt. I am going back to school. Well, that's the plan. I have to register for the math class I have to take on August 14th and classes start on the 18th. That is the only class I can take this semester since I am planning on applying to the Dental Assisting program in April. I need this class to be able to apply for the program and this is the last semester before the application process begins for the program. I'm not sure how much the class is going to cost or the book yet but it can't be too expensive for just one class! I hope not. 
Anyway, the Dental Assisting program is one fall, spring and summer term and then it's over. Starting out pay is about $20 an hour and most dental offices only work 4 days a week. I should be ok with money by then. I want to take a loan out large enough for me to pay for school and my living expenses since just the first semester alone is 21 credit hours and it would be impossible to work full time and go to school. This would be great so that I could move out on my own.
Here's my life in a nutshell:
I wake up go to work for 8 hours or more where I make nowhere near enough money to make a dent in my bills.
I come home...
walk in the door and he starts in on me to go work out. "Why are you so lazy. You need to go work out and stop sitting on your ass."
we argue some more. He calls me some name usually with fat in front of it or some form of it.
I cry. 
I reluctantly go upstairs and work out. Kill myself working out so that I can feel even more disgusting because another day goes by without losing any weight. 
I come downstairs and clean a bit, cook dinner.
I take a shower smoke some cigarettes and go to bed.
I crawl in bed with the ceiling fan on because it gets too hot in there without to me. 
"Lose some weight and it won't be so fucking hot." is what I hear when I beg him to leave the fan on so I can get some sleep.
I cry myself to sleep.
Wake up late.
Start all over.
Can't go anywhere because I am broke all the time. Can't go anywhere because I can't drive except to work and home with my limited driving privilege license due to the DWI. 
Things aren't real good. 

Don't get me wrong some days are good. Sometimes he looks at me like he still cares. But it has been months since we have had sex. It has been so long since he's touched me like he actually loves me still. It kills me to be around him. Instead of anything to impress me, it is anything to annoy or piss me off. But I'm a bitch, a fat bitch at that. 

I like a boy at work. We are always together. It started out slow. We spoke sometimes when we happened to be outside smoking at the same time. Then we started getting each other to go smoke together. Now he has the nickname Muffin and everyone thinks there is something going on. We talk about everything. He knows my situation. We had this work function and it was my time to hang out with him outside of work so I went. I fought with my boyfriend and stayed at my friend Kim's apartment. Work boy and I exchanged phone numbers at the work thing and then after we left we texted each other....he came and picked me up from Kim's. We and our 3rd partner from work who is always with us all went to the pool hall then we and some other friends of theirs went to a nasty strip club, ridiculously fun shockingly. We went to our friend from work's apartment and hung out with his wife and 2 of his step children and drank some more and then he drove me back to Kim's, it was 6am when I got back. Nothing inappropriate happened. It was the most fun I have had in a very long time. 
We haven't hung out with him outside of work since then obviously since I am in a relationship and he can't know about us hanging out...I feel guilty even though nothing happened. Anyway, he doesn't like me as more than a friend I don't think. He gives me such mixed signals. I'm pretty sure I'm completely not his type. I don't know if I'm anyone's type. 
He has my self esteem so fucked up worse than it ever was. UGH.
I'm sick of this already. I can't get my thoughts out like I am having them. Everything is all mixed up in my head. I'll write something worth a shit after I get myself together.

holy shit. i had completely forgotten about this thing until just now. i don't know what made me think about this journal but im glad i did. i got a new laptop and will be able to actually use this. hmmm....update later. must go get my noodles off the stove! haha

So, I am so frustrated with myspace that I decided to get on here and write instead. Myspace is being a complete fag and won't load. I have been seeing a guy for the past few weeks and as much as I never thought I would ever want to get married or have kids...I can see myself having a LIFE with this guy. He is amazing and I can't get over how he treats me or how he makes me feel. I also got a new job finally after losing my last one for missing too many days, since I was living with psycho bitch and she kept getting me sick because she was constantly sick! I hate her and hope she dies. Seriously, that girl ain't right in the head. So yeah, I'll be making $10 an hour, a dollar more than I made at the last place and the most I've made at any job. So hopefully I will be able to save up a good amount of money and move back out on my own. It's very depressing to live on your own for so long and then hit hard times and have to move back in with your mother. I'm finally 21 so that's nice...I lost my job a week after I turned 21 so I haven't been able to enjoy it as much as I could if I had money...but the boyfriend and my 2 bestest friends (Amanda and Stephanie) have been amazing and take me out like 5 times a week and pay for me to get plastered. Always fun. All my bands have been awesome about not making me pay (though I rarely did before) too so I'm lucky to have such great friends. August 9th I start my 3 weeks of training for the new job at www.eros-guide.com at the call center. It should be interesting, as always when I'm entering new territory I'm nervous, but I'm sure I'll do fine. I've been really extra emotional lately and I'm not quite sure why. I think I might be PMSing but I have never been this whacked out before. The tiniest things have been making me cry, whether it be happy or sad tears....or a mixture of both since I have been so wacky here. I'm sure I'll be fine, it's just I have a lot going on I guess. Anyway, I just felt the need to write some shit out before I tried to go to sleep, sort of try and clear my head...sweet dreams everyone. xoxo

all i have to say is im so nervous about my interview tomorrow that i cant sleep and i am going to have to be up in a few hours!! blah!!!!!! and i fucking hate craig, but not really, i like him so much that it hurts that i havent talked to him since saturday and cant get a hold of him! why does he do this shit to me!?!!?!?!?! god damnit.

yes, so i hardly use this thing anymore since i am on myspace now...but some things i feel i just cant write about on there. like the fact that i am now friends with the owner of tribunal records, who just happens to be the singer for killwhitneydead...my FAVORITE band. since my blogs are read by him and everyone else...i cant exactly write about this there...unless i want to seem like the biggest dork ever, which of course i am. i mean who gets excited over stuff like this??? i do. i had an interview at pac sun the other day, it went well i believe...im supposed to hear something by friday. i have an interview at whole foods in chapel hill tomorrow, well actually today now...at 1pm. i am so nervous because that is exactly where i want to work. well, i mean i really want to work at the one in raleigh since its a hell of a lot closer, but they aren't hiring...and chapel hill one gave me an interview first. all i know is i desperately need a job. my bills are so bad, and my mother can not help me and she doesnt know how much in debt i am. ugh.  everybody pray for me and cross your fingers...i need all the good luck i can get.

this silence between us is forever. i will not hold you dear to me anymore. my admiration has vanished and my disgust holds on strong. i thought that you were different, a caring mind and soul...but selfishness has risen and i will not be the victim of your charm.

this goes out to me.


<font size= 8>I HATE YOU.</font>

so much has gone on that i want to write about, but im too fucked up to write about it all. only thing im gonna say in this entry is...who has a script on its way for adderall?? I DO!!! oh jesus...i have hit the mother fucking jackpot.

ok so im seeing doug again on wednesday. im excited. i hope things go well again. i believe he will help me get my life in gear...and find what it is i want out of life. :) i heart him in a professional way.

kim, you are a stupid fat bitch. yeah. you have no idea what being a friend, shit even being a fucking person, is about. i hope you and your ugly pathetic boyfriend (who talked mad shit about you until we forced him to hang out with you) both die terrible terrible deaths. no, actually, i hope he becomes cool (haha yeah right) and gets some other chick and leaves you ALONE, like you will end up eventually anyway...because you are a complete ass and psyho. People can only put up with your shit but for so long. haha, god you are so fucking retarded. I can't even keep a straight face typing this bc you make me laugh so much. Even though I could and should bring your ass to court for my car (fucking selfish childish bitch) I'm not even going to bother because karma is a bitch and you will get what is coming to you. well, i do believe im finished.

ok so things are ok i guess, this single again thing isnt too bad i guess...i did some stupid things these past few days...and i dont feel too great about them, but oh well. i need to make some more friends.  i need some more girl friends, or maybe just sme of the old ones back...theres only like maybe 2 old girl friends i miss and neither one seem to care if im alive or not. im tired of feeling like i have to beg for these people to hang out with me....so, if anyone wants to fucking hang out they can call me. i wouldnt mind getting some pharms soon, but i dont see it happenening. besides the awkwardness i will feel the next time im around a certain someone, i fucking love frexon zo. they are so amazingly talented...ok i think im going to go to target and spend money i dont have.

its over. im done. ill recover. ill be ok. i CAN move on. i WILL move on. 

i hurt myself today
to see if i still feel
i focus on the pain
the only thing that's real
the needle tears a hole
the old familiar sting
try to kill it all away
but i remember everything

what have i become?
my sweetest friend
everyone i know
goes away in the end
you could have it all
my empire of dirt
i will let you down
i will make you hurt

i wear this crown of shit
upon my liar's chair
full of broken thoughts
i cannot repair
beneath the stains of time
the feelings disappear
you are someone else
i am still right here

what have i become?
my sweetest friend
everyone i know
goes away in the end
and you could have it all
my empire of dirt
i will let you down
i will make you hurt

i am so ready to update this thing but i dont have time....i need to vent but i dont feel comfortable doing so on here...every time i really vent on here it blows up in my face. im waiting on jessica to get out of the shower so we can go to my house...im at harrison's house right now...um today my car was put in the shop bc i had a flat tire and it turns out it really needed 2 new tires and a complete brake job, like everything to do with the brakes...so grand total $571. my dad put it on his credit card but im supposed to pay him some of it back...NOT. i am so stressed about money and a shit load of other stuff going on. i feel like jessica is the only person i can depend on to help me out with shit...she might get pissy if she has to help me out with something every now and then but thats only bc all people are like that...when it comes down to it everybody is selfish...the people who bitch but end up helping you out are the ones who are real friends...ill explain what i mean later when i sit down at my house and really update this bitch. bottom line for now, i love jessica, shes my best friend and i dont know what id do without her.

so it is 6:48 am and i have one more line of coke left and its killing me. i am addicted again...but only when i am high...like when i come down i wont think about it, not like crave it or whatever. i dont know how to explain it. we just got home from the show at the lincoln tonight. it was great. automag did marvelous as always and rebel son kicked ass. after the show we went to lee's house (the singer/guitar player for rebel son) and hung out. ive been fucked up for hours...mark suprised me with it after they got off stage! how sweet a boyfriend he is...he also let me have the last like 3 lines of it!! he mustve been fucking exhausted bc he is passed out right now and he was doing coke...and he can never sleep when he does it...oh well. i love him so much. we hung out with sorrow valley at the show....very cool guys...jack seems like such a great person.aaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh i love drugs so much...tomorrow is winterfest at the lincoln, i cant wait...sorrow valley is playing!! YAY! maybe we'll get more coke tomorrow too?!?!? yum. no, im not a druggie...i swear.

ok so im going out with jessica tonight and that means i wont see mark tonight. this is the first night in like 3 months we wont spend together...it makes me sad and i miss him all ready...but tonight should be fun. :) me and jessica havent really hung out since me and mark started dating...so its been a pretty long time. well im going to get dressed.

today was a fucking shitty day. and tonight is a shitty night. its 9 fucking 30 at night and mark has not called me all day. i keep trying his house but the line is busy. he probably fell asleep with the phone off the hook or something. OR he's out fucking drinking. i am so pissed he hasnt called me. but i dont like being pissed he hasnt called me...he shouldnt have to call me every second of the day....but then again he should at least call me once...especially since he was supposed to come over tonight after getting clothes from his house...god damnit. why cant things just for once go right. i dont like feeling like im sitting here waiting for him. 

and in the back of my head all im thinking is how bad i want to see him. :-

i have realized so many things about myself within the last 24 hours, and accepted myself for who i am. im a really fucked up thinker...and i never realized how much i held everything i thought inside. im so in love with mark that its more painful than any heartache ive ever been through, it doesn't make sense but it makes so much sense. after last night/this morning...there is absolutely no doubt in my mind that he is my soul mate. he helps me figure myself out, and urges me to be me no matter what...instead of trying to change me into how he wants me...because to him im perfect the way i am. with him i feel as though we could make it through anything as long as we had each other...and i feel as though everything will be all right in the end. and it is.

Everything is all right. 


The end

Ok, so in LJ land I've been a total loser and haven't updated in forever. I'm sorry, but I really don't see the point much. I have been pretty happy lately. I'm "seeing" Mark, the bass player for Automag. Well, we aren't exactly "seeing" each other. We are doing something, we just aren't exactly sure what that is yet. We care about each other and that's all that matters right now. Things have been good I guess. All I've been doing is working and going to shows and hanging out at the practice space with they guys. (MagnetHead, Age Of Despair, and of course Automag) Jessica and I went to Fayetteville saturday night and saw Motograter and Dope! It was an awesome show. All the Motograter guys are great, always so nice. Their second drummer (the one I was so excited to see) missed the show though, he had a baby...well his wife or girlfriend or whatever had one! lol So I forgive him for missing it. I've made a few decisions these last few weeks and I'm excited to see that I may actually make something of myself. I am working on doing things by myself and not depending on other people. I have so many good ideas but I always feel I need someone to help me and to be there with me to do it...well I realize that I am the only one who can make my ideas come to life. 


November 19---Jester's Pub, Fayetteville, NC----
This will be one of the saddest nights ever. This is Twan's last night playing in MagnetHead. I support him in his decision, I just wish there was a better way. He is leaving to concentrate on school so he can finally finish...I hope he achieves everything he has ever wanted to...god knows he is/was in the best band ever. :*( I'm going to have to get the club to allow me to take my camera in though, because they don't allow them...but I will not miss taking pictures of his last show..hell no

ok so i have decided to not have any friends anymore. i dont want to have any. i might talk to people every now and then and i might do things with people, but i wont have any FRIENDS. not girls anyway. maybe one day. maybe ill do it one day. or unexpectedly but not on purpose. girls are stupid and selfish when you least expect it and this pisses me off. i am excited about this week coming up because chris is on vacation and he is taking care of me. yes. we are going to many drugs. i am going to do shrooms for the first time. i am anxious to see what its like. i cant wait. ive never been so excited to do drugs in my life. i have decided everything ive been doing lately (obsessing over the stm shit and magnethead and aod and all the other bands) is just keeping me from becoming who i am. I have always lived through other people. yeah, i said it. I have my own dreams and ideas and everything..but instead of going and doing what i want to do or trying to get somewhere on my own i try to cling to people who are where i want to be...or like i want to be. i see someone who is cool and i want to be friends with them and its stupid. i am going to become me. i want someone to see me and decided they want to know me, not the other way around. i just finished reading the rules of attraction. i loved it. yeah maybe im stupid for liking it? but it really made me think and it made me realize a lot about the way i am. along with all the terrible things that have happened lately. whenever i feel like something is the whole world to me or even someone it all comes crashing down and i feel like i could just die. i dont understand how i can take things so seriously but not take them seriously at the same time. this shit going on...yeah i wanted to kill my fucking self over it...really i did, and if i wasnt so big of a pussy i would..down a damn bottle of pills with a beer or something i dont know...but then i would sit and think about everything i would miss out on if i did and how much it would kill my mother and how much i love my mother and want nothing more than to make her proud of me, which is why i have decided to take that part time job with chris and go back to school and try real hard to get the fuck out of here.

i'm sitting up here at r&r. its braden's day alone, well rocky is here, but he is the only tattoo artist today. i'm so pissed off..his wife came in here the other day and saw my "michelle loves you" sign he had hung on his mirror in his room and made him take it down and gave him a bunch of shit about me and him. i mean i dont blame her...but still. i hate this. i hate having to pretend i dont want anything to happen between us when thats all i want. i hope he doesnt walk over here and see me typing this, that would fucking suck. oh well. he is cleaning his tubes right now so he probably wont come over here. i went to leave and he told me to stay...i dont know why he wants me to stay...he hasn't been acting as though he is happy to see me lately. i dont know. we got into a conversation about my father. he said that when he did my dad's tattoo he told him the whole story with our family..how he left and me and wendy hadnt talked to him...and how i just started talking to him recently. we discussed this shit for a while and nothing was really resolved. i didn't really say much because i didnt want to get too emotional. i wish i wouldve been here when my dad got his tattoo...i wouldve heard everything that was said..but no, now i dont know exactly what all was said between them about me or anything at all..and it pisses me off. i'm depressed now and i dont want to be up here for much longer...i dont know why he asked me to stay. god damnit i dont know why i fucking love him like i do but it is killing me and i wish it would just end all ready. i keep trying not to not to cry but its not working too well....rocky just asked me why i look all teary eyed. i told him i had just yawned. im a bad liar.

ok so he gave me a hug good bye like always as we depart, but he once again (second time) acted like he was going to kiss me, but this time he actually puckered his lips and went towards me...i shoved him and said stop you retard! why he keeps playing with me i dont know. it is killing me. i may be working on tuesdays with him, those are his days alone. it would be me and him all alone all day long. oh god. i'd die. there is noway we could be together that much and nothing happen with us. married or not. i love him
i am so pissed off and hurt and depressed. i fucking hate everything. dont act like you care either, or wait...nobody is probably reading this shit anyway.
